verses.text: \w James|strong="G2385"\w*, a \w servant|strong="G1401"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, to \w the|strong="G5443"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w tribes|strong="G5443"\w* which \w are|strong="G3588"\w* scattered \w abroad|strong="G1290"\w*, \w greeting|strong="G5463"\w*.

\w My|strong="G3450"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, count \w it|strong="G2233"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w* \w when|strong="G3752"\w* ye fall \w into|strong="G4045"\w* \w divers|strong="G4164"\w* \w temptations|strong="G3986"\w*;

\w Knowing|strong="G1097"\w* \add this\add*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w trying|strong="G1383"\w* of \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w worketh|strong="G2716"\w* \w patience|strong="G5281"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* let \w patience|strong="G5281"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \add her\add* \w perfect|strong="G5046"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye may \w be|strong="G5600"\w* \w perfect|strong="G5046"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w entire|strong="G3648"\w*, \w wanting|strong="G3007"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* of \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w lack|strong="G3007"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w*, let him \w ask|strong="G0154"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, that \w giveth|strong="G1325"\w* to \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add men\add* \w liberally|strong="G0574"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w upbraideth|strong="G3679"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* it shall be \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* let him \w ask|strong="G0154"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w* \w wavering|strong="G1252"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* he that \w wavereth|strong="G1252"\w* is \w like|strong="G1503"\w* a \w wave|strong="G2830"\w* of the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w* driven with the \w wind|strong="G0416"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w tossed|strong="G4494"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* let \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w think|strong="G3633"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he shall \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* any \w thing|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

A double \w minded|strong="G1374"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w* \add is\add* \w unstable|strong="G0182"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w ways|strong="G3598"\w*.

\w Let|strong="G1161"\w* the \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* of low \w degree|strong="G5011"\w* \w rejoice|strong="G2744"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* that \w he|strong="G0846"\w* is \w exalted|strong="G5311"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the \w rich|strong="G4145"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* that \w he|strong="G0846"\w* is made \w low|strong="G5014"\w*: \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w flower|strong="G0438"\w* of the \w grass|strong="G5528"\w* he shall pass \w away|strong="G3928"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w sun|strong="G2246"\w* is no sooner \w risen|strong="G0393"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* a burning \w heat|strong="G2742"\w*, \w but|strong="G2532"\w* it \w withereth|strong="G3583"\w* the \w grass|strong="G5528"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w flower|strong="G0438"\w* \w thereof|strong="G0846"\w* \w falleth|strong="G1601"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w grace|strong="G2143"\w* of the \w fashion|strong="G4383"\w* of \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w perisheth|strong="G0622"\w*: \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w shall|strong="G3133"\w* the rich \w man|strong="G4145"\w* fade \w away|strong="G3133"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w ways|strong="G4197"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="G3107"\w* \add is\add* the \w man|strong="G0435"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w endureth|strong="G5278"\w* \w temptation|strong="G3986"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* when he \w is|strong="G1096"\w* \w tried|strong="G1384"\w*, he shall \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* the \w crown|strong="G4735"\w* of \w life|strong="G2222"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* hath \w promised|strong="G1861"\w* to \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

Let no \w man|strong="G3367"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w when|strong="G3754"\w* he is \w tempted|strong="G3985"\w*, I am \w tempted|strong="G3985"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* cannot be \w tempted|strong="G0551"\w* with \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*, \w neither|strong="G1161"\w* \w tempteth|strong="G3985"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* any \w man|strong="G3762"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* every \w man|strong="G1538"\w* is \w tempted|strong="G3985"\w*, when he is drawn \w away|strong="G1828"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* his \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w lust|strong="G1939"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w enticed|strong="G1185"\w*.

Then \w when|strong="G1534"\w* \w lust|strong="G1939"\w* hath \w conceived|strong="G4815"\w*, it bringeth \w forth|strong="G5088"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*, when it is \w finished|strong="G0658"\w*, bringeth \w forth|strong="G0616"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*.
\w Do|strong="G4105"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w err|strong="G4105"\w*, \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*.

\w Every|strong="G3956"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w gift|strong="G1394"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w perfect|strong="G5046"\w* \w gift|strong="G1434"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* from \w above|strong="G0509"\w*, and cometh \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* of \w lights|strong="G5457"\w*, \w with|strong="G3844"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G1762"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w variableness|strong="G3883"\w*, \w neither|strong="G2228"\w* \w shadow|strong="G0644"\w* of \w turning|strong="G5157"\w*.

Of his own \w will|strong="G1014"\w* begat \w he|strong="G0616"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* with the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*, that \w we|strong="G2248"\w* should \w be|strong="G1511"\w* a \w kind|strong="G5100"\w* of \w firstfruits|strong="G0536"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w creatures|strong="G2938"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G5620"\w*, \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, let \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w be|strong="G2077"\w* \w swift|strong="G5036"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w hear|strong="G0191"\w*, \w slow|strong="G1021"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w*, \w slow|strong="G1021"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w*:

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w* of \w man|strong="G0435"\w* \w worketh|strong="G2716"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* lay \w apart|strong="G0659"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w filthiness|strong="G4507"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w superfluity|strong="G4050"\w* of \w naughtiness|strong="G2549"\w*, and \w receive|strong="G1209"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w meekness|strong="G4240"\w* the \w engrafted|strong="G1721"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* is \w able|strong="G1410"\w* to \w save|strong="G4982"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w souls|strong="G5590"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w* ye \w doers|strong="G4163"\w* of the \w word|strong="G3056"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w hearers|strong="G0202"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w*, \w deceiving|strong="G3884"\w* your own \w selves|strong="G1438"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* be a \w hearer|strong="G0202"\w* of the \w word|strong="G3056"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* a \w doer|strong="G4163"\w*, \w he|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* like \w unto|strong="G1503"\w* a \w man|strong="G0435"\w* \w beholding|strong="G2657"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w natural|strong="G1078"\w* \w face|strong="G4383"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* a \w glass|strong="G2072"\w*:

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* he \w beholdeth|strong="G2657"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* goeth his \w way|strong="G0565"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w straightway|strong="G2112"\w* \w forgetteth|strong="G1950"\w* what manner of \w man|strong="G3697"\w* he \w was|strong="G2258"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* whoso \w looketh|strong="G3879"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w perfect|strong="G5046"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* of \w liberty|strong="G1657"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w continueth|strong="G3887"\w* \add therein\add*, \w he|strong="G3778"\w* \w being|strong="G1096"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* a \w forgetful|strong="G1953"\w* \w hearer|strong="G0202"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* a \w doer|strong="G4163"\w* of the \w work|strong="G2041"\w*, this \w man|strong="G3778"\w* shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w blessed|strong="G3107"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w deed|strong="G4162"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w seem|strong="G1380"\w* to \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w religious|strong="G2357"\w*, and \w bridleth|strong="G5468"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w tongue|strong="G1100"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w deceiveth|strong="G0538"\w* his \w own|strong="G0846"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*, this \w manâ€™s|strong="G5127"\w* \w religion|strong="G2356"\w* \add is\add* \w vain|strong="G3152"\w*.

\w Pure|strong="G2513"\w* \w religion|strong="G2356"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w undefiled|strong="G0283"\w* \w before|strong="G3844"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*, To \w visit|strong="G1980"\w* the \w fatherless|strong="G3737"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w widows|strong="G5503"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w affliction|strong="G2347"\w*, \add and\add* to \w keep|strong="G5083"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w unspotted|strong="G0784"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*.
